info.name: apply insulate operator to tree
info.description:
Fork of [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/sdscDs[/url].
Proof of concept: rendering a tree-structure efficiently by applying the "insulate" operator to TLC's tree 2d sdf to convert it to a 3d sdf,
using [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/sl2SRt[/url].
